name: YoyoPoyo
description:
Made in 24 hours for the GameMaker Game Jam 2021 (GMTK Game Jam).

The theme of the game jam was "Joined Together".

Solve 10 puzzles by controlling two characters at the same time. Use and avoid the environment to get Yoyo and Poyo to the end goal.

Controls
  • Use the arrow keys to move
  • Use the R key to reset a level
  • Press Esc to quit in Windows

All programming, art, sound, and music are original works created in under 24 hours for the game jam.
